trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Bogota
There were no other sightings in Bogota on or around May 18th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Object behind me in photo above the mountains in the background.
divs: Sighting DetailsI didn't witness the actual "object," nor do I remember any aircraft in the area. I was about 4 hours from Bogota,Colombia, in a small mountain village calle Villa de Leyva. On one of our tours, we stopped to take some pictures by this lake. I didn't notice that there was an object until I actually looked at the picture months later. It's an object that seems to be hovering above the mountains behind me. Upon seeing it for the first time in the photo, I felt that this was no airplane, helicopter, bird or spot on my lens. I was a bit surprised actually. Most people that I show the photo to are like "wow...that looks like a ufo.." What do you think? Some feedback? Thanks for your time.
